title: The Birth Of ESPN & Major Media with Founder Bill Rasmussen [Podcast 244]
snippet: His name is Bill Rasmussen. He’s the Founder of ESPN.

title: History of ESPN - Wikipedia
snippet: ESPN was founded by Bill Rasmussen, his son Scott Rasmussen, and 43 year old eye doctor and Aetna insurance agent Ed Eagan. Bill, who had an affinity with sports for much of his life, was fired from his position as the communications manager for the New England Whalers in 1978.

title: The Untold Origin Story of ESPN
snippet: How Bill and Scott Rasmussen created ESPN, sports programming’s North Star, on a wing, a prayer, and a chunk of Getty cash—and walked out with almost nothing.
